original_title: Morgue Story: Sangue, Baiacu e Quadrinhos
overview: Ana Argento, an accomplished cartoon artist yet frustrated with her relationships, meets two other lonely characters with peculiar lives. Daniel Torres is a sociopath and rapist coroner. Tom is a chronic cataleptic who ironically is a life insurance salesman. They could only meet in one place: the morgue.
tagline: This may not be any of your business, but this is the story of when I died.
title: Morgue Story: Sangue, Baiacu e Quadrinhos
